{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-N15 |revision= |upc=610839789023 |ean= |asin=B001L80CS0 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/02/2008 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Pegatron |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MSQ-RTN15 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2 |pwr_barrel_len=10 |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT2880;RT2880F, N1C0150G0, 0947ST; |cpu1_cspeed=266 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320DBTI-70G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM639165TS-6G |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, J1,, 3.3V TTL,, (57600,8,N,1) |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2880;RT2880F, N1C0150G0, 0947ST; |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2820;RT2820L, C0W4110E0, 0950ST; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=none |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8366SR;RTL8366SR, 9AH29S1, G942B TAIWAN; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6694;188, 6694, A947;2;SiGe;QFN24; |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3; |stock_os=Linux;2.4.30; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=ASUS |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=E0:CB:4E |oui_eth=E0:CB:4E }} {{TagLine|SuperSpeedN Gigabit Wireless Router}} :[http://www.asus.com/Networks/Wireless_Routers/RTN15/ Product page] The '''ASUS''' logo, "RT-N15", "REV: 1.10", and "PCB MADE IN TAIWAN" :is silkscreened on the board below. The power adapter included with the device is a :'''UMEC''' UP0181B-05PA (5V, 2.5A). ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate. ===Wikis=== *{{TechInfoDepot|Asus_RT-N15}} *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/asus/rt-n15 On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Asus_RT-N15 On the '''DD-WRT''' Wiki] ===Forums=== [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=38533 ''Asus RT-N15 support'' on '''DD-WRT''' forums] ===Serial=== ====Pinout==== 
J1
[3.3]
(RxD) --> to RT2880
(TxD)
(GND)
